overview_of_class: How US foreign policy is formulated, executed, legitimated, and contested. Topics include 9/11 and its aftermath, covert action, interventionism, trade, US respect for international norms, and US engagement with the Middle East.
name: U.S. Foreign Policy
title: WCAS POLI_SCI 344-0-20 U.S. Foreign Policy

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: How US foreign policy is formulated, executed, legitimated, and contested. Topics include 9/11 and its aftermath, covert action, interventionism, trade, US respect for international norms, and US engagement with the Middle East.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Bruce W. Jentleson, American Foreign Policy, 5th Edition, ISBN #978-0-393-91943-1, Paperback

subject: POLI_SCI
